name: rps-card-game
description: Rock Paper Scissors Card Game with AI opponents - Console and Web versions

scripts.test-ai: node -e "const {TestRunner} = require('./console/test'); const runner = new TestRunner(); runner.runAIvsAITest().then(() => { runner.displayResults(); process.exit(0); });"
scripts.test-random: node -e "const {TestRunner} = require('./console/test'); const runner = new TestRunner(); runner.runAIvsRandomTest().then(() => { runner.displayResults(); process.exit(0); });"
scripts.test-multi: node -e "const {TestRunner} = require('./console/test'); const runner = new TestRunner(); runner.runAIvsAIMultiTest().then(() => { runner.displayResults(); process.exit(0); });"
scripts.test-all: node -e "const {TestRunner, CardAnalysis} = require('./console/test'); CardAnalysis.analyzeAllCards(); const runner = new TestRunner(); runner.runAllTests().then(() => process.exit(0));"
scripts.web: echo 'Open web/index.html in your browser to play the web version'

author: RPS Card Game Developer
